title: Centrifugal Impeller Design
intro: Centrifugal impellers are crucial in turbomachinery, converting rotational energy into fluid motion. They accelerate fluid radially outward, increasing pressure and kinetic energy. Efficient impeller design requires precise aerodynamic shaping, structural robustness, and material suitability.

sections.title: Draft
sections.content: The draft of the design was created in Onshape. An A4 sheet was used, the drawing scale is 1:2, and all dimensions are shown in millimeters.
